import { TextField, Grid, Box, Typography } from '@material-ui/core' import { ButtonSave, ButtonCancel, gridMessageError, BackdropLoading } from '../customHooks/customComponents' export const Presentational=( { dataBook, setDataBook, onChangeInput, submitForm, backList, response, loading, error })=>{ return (
{BackdropLoading(loading)} Mantenimiento de Libros {error && gridMessageError(error) } {(response && response.success===false) && gridMessageError(response.error) } {(response && response.success===true) && {gridMessageSuccess("")} } onChangeInput(ev)} /> onChangeInput(ev)} /> onChangeInput(ev)} /> onChangeInput(ev)} /> onChangeInput(ev)} /> {ButtonSave("Guardar", submitForm, loading)} {ButtonCancel("Cancelar", backList, loading)}
); };
